WITH P AS ( select name, prof_id from tbl_professor ), C AS ( select curriculum_seq, name, fk_department_seq, required from tbl_curriculum ), V AS ( select course_seq, fk_curriculum_seq, fk_professor_id, fk_student_id from tbl_course join tbl_registered_course on course_seq = fk_course_seq ) select p.name as professorName, c.name as className, c.fk_department_seq as department_seq, c.required as required
from P JOIN V on V.fk_professor_id = P.prof_id JOIN C on V.fk_curriculum_seq = C.curriculum_seq where V.fk_student_id = #{userid}
select department_name from tbl_department join tbl_student on tbl_department.department_seq = tbl_student.fk_department_seq where student_id = #{student_id}
